column3: obliviscéris me in finem~? ¿~Úsqŭeqŭo avèrtis fáciem tuam a me~? ^ How long
column5: wilt thou forget me unto the end~? How long dost thou turn away thy face from me~?

column2: dolórem in corde meo per diem~? ¿~Úsqŭeqŭo exaltábitur inimícus meus super me~? ^ How long shall I take counsels in my soul
column3: sorrow in my heart all the day~? How long shall my enemy be exalted over me~?
Dòmine Deus meus. Illúmina òculos meos
column7: O Lord my God. Enlighten my eyes
column8: that I never sleep in death

column3: exsultábunt si motus fúero. ^ lest at any time my enemy say
column4: "I have prevailed against him"~; they that trouble me
column5: will rejoice when I am moved.

column1: 6 ^ Ego aŭtem in misericórdia tua sperávi~; exsultábit cor meum in salutári tuo. Cantábo Dòmino qŭi bona trìbuit mìhi
column2: et psallem nómini Dòmini altìssimi. ^ But I have trusted in thy mercy~; my heart shall rejoice in thy salvation. I will sing to the Lord who giveth me good things
column3: and I will sing to the name of the Lord the most high.
